messages.text: I never suspected how much I would come to care for you, but I'm glad the world brought us together.
messages.author: Jeremy Guido

messages.text: You are a goddess, amazing mother, and a true companion.
messages.author: Jeremy Guido

messages.text: I'm sorry I am a man.
messages.author: Jeremy Guido (:

messages.text: These quotes will only display once but they are updated in the repo when I think of you.
messages.author: Jeremy Guido

messages.text: This project was inspired by a mechanical version of the moon phase clock I am designing.
messages.author: Jeremy Guido

messages.text: If you ever want some other kind of functionality added, just let me know.
messages.author: Jeremy Guido

messages.text: You are a Brat sometimes, don't stop.
messages.author: Jeremy Guido
